126b6(mdo sde): kyi thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/ de'i 'og tu gdong bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas
126b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi po dag gi sku tshe'i tshed ji tsam par bdag gi byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du ring bar gyur cig/ de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par bdag cig
127a1(mdo sde): bu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po de la sangs rgyas stong rtswa ba ni po de dag gis sems can ji snyed btul bar gyur pa'i sems can de snyed
127a2(mdo sde): gcig bdag gis kyang btul bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi bslab pa la 'khrul par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i g.yang sar ltung bar gyur pa
127a3(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam la ma gus pa'i sems dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems su gyur pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la 'khrul pa'i sems su gyur pa dang / 'dod chags
127a4(mdo sde): kyi sems dag dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang / mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byin cing mi 'jigs pa'i
127a5(mdo sde): khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyur cig/ ji srid du bdag yongs su mya ngan lba la nas ngam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po yang bas par ma gyur
127a6(mdo sde): cig/ bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par gyur pa na/ bskal pa bzang po yang bas par gyur cig/ bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen
127a7(mdo sde): k ho'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing mtshan re re yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur te gnas par gyur
127b1(mdo sde): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku re re kyang sems can
127b2(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na bar gyi bskal pa zhig par
127b3(mdo sde): ma gyur pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing slad kyis yid bzhin nor bur gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
127b4(mdo sde): gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis shing rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig/ sangs
127b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang / phral zhing nad gyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang tsan danas mchog pa dang / sbrul gyi snying po dang /
127b6(mdo sde): dus kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gi spos kyi char rab tu 'babs par gyur cig/ spos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nang rnams dang /
127b7(mdo sde): lus kyi nang rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig/ de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing / mtho ris la gzhol bar
128a1(mdo sde): yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang
128a2(mdo sde): de ltar sangs rgyas mdzad pa bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams yongs su skyob
128a3(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag phyogs
128a4(mdo sde): b cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dag bslus
128a5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang ma gyur cig// bcom ldan 'das srog chags bye ba phrag mang po gang dag bla na med
128a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa de dag kyang / bdag gis thugs byung bar bgyis par gyur ci
128a7(mdo sde): bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor ba na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / dge ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i chos kyi sgra dag rna lam du klag par ma gyur cig/
128b1(mdo sde): gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag rtag tu mnar med par gtogs par gyur cig/
128b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u sto bla chen shugs 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod ni sems can rnams
128b3(mdo sde): kyi sman du 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal ngag las yongs su thar par byed par yang 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med ces bya bar gyur cig/ sman gyi rgya lo skar ma dri ma med pa khyod
128b4(mdo sde): ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong
128b5(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag bzhin du bsod snyoms 'bul bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes
128b6(mdo sde): gnyen gtsug pud bzang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
128b7(mdo sde): pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/ / khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
129a1(mdo sde): ji snyed du 'gyur ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de sbed du 'gyur la/ sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ji srid du bskal pa
129a2(mdo sde): chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur la de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char pas sems
129a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nad rnams dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
129a4(mdo sde): gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris la gzhol bar byed par yang 'gyur ro/ / // bam po dgu pa// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa'
129a5(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi
129a6(mdo sde): mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis bdag gi spyi bo la byug par gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma
129a7(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i spyi bo la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so/ / rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar
129b1(mdo sde): ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
129b2(mdo sde): bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te/ spras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis smon lam bzang por btab ste/ da phyin chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya
129b3(mdo sde): mi dgos kyis/ ji ltar bde ba nyid du spyod cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di na snang ba dag da ltar bdag
129b4(mdo sde): gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug go/ / sems can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni smon lam rgya che dgu
129b5(mdo sde): btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba sha stag yongs su blangs te/ khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod pa'i dus yongs su spangs pas/ bdag gis ni
129b6(mdo sde): rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na/ sems can rnams chos kyis bcud kyis mgron du gnyer bar bya zhing / brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/ bdag gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
129b7(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang / lha dang / dri za dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar
130a1(mdo sde): te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin cing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du
130a2(mdo sde): s angs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs
130a3(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang mdzad la lo nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shin
130a4(mdo sde): phopo nya de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang phyi ma'i dus na/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe'i
130a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nang dag gis bdas par gyur par sems
130a6(mdo sde): can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang mdzad par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la yang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bskal
130a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
130b1(mdo sde): 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa dang / dbyangs kyang sgrog par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi smon
130b2(mdo sde): lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par
130b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing de dag kyang sems can la snying rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de nas de dag kyang de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar da ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung
130b4(mdo sde): pab de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / chu bo bzhis bdas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur
130b5(mdo sde): zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar gyur pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo//
130b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par bskyed nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/
130b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ngo // yang de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyar bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
131a1(mdo sde): dag gis sal bkrol zhing me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig mthun par smras pa/ skyes bu dpa pa legs so legs so// khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon lam/
131a2(mdo sde): rab mchog dag shod la zung shig dang / khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan
131a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor des kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas/ tshig mthun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo
131a4(mdo sde): mchog mnga' ba smon lam brtan por thob shig dang / bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo// gang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdun na 'don gyis pus mo'i lha ngas
131a5(mdo sde): la btsugs pa dang / de'i mong la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam pa de thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul
131a6(mdo sde): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg go// sil snyan dag kyang ma bkrol bar sgra khrol lo// ri dgas dang bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so//
131a7(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dag las kyang me tog dag 'bul lo// stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs pa
131b1(mdo sde): gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa gang yin pa dag dang / byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang /
131b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i sems dang / khon med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to// sems can gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram
131b3(mdo sde): ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la 'khod nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog dang / me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rin po'i tshe'i
131b4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / ras bcos bu dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lha gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang bram
131b5(mdo sde): ze'i smon lam nyan pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing / lha'i spos dang / ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// bram zes
131b6(mdo sde): kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin// gzugs
131b7(mdo sde): kyis 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste/ / rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing // rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong deng bzhin// zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ril seng ge 'dra// mi 'gul brtan pa
132a1(mdo sde): lhun po 'dra ba ste/ / rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mang ga zhing // yon tan ston la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod// dri ma thams cad dang pa rgyu bzhin te// thub pa me ltar
132a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs nags rnams sreg/ rlung ltar gang la'ang chags pa mi mnga' zhing // thub pa lta ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston// klu ltar thub pa chos kyi chur 'bebs shing // char pa bzhin du 'gro
132a3(mdo sde): kun ngoms par mdzad/ / pha rol mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra// me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong // tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i tshig gsung zhing // 'gro ba sdug bsngal grol
132a4(mdo sde): mdzad sman pa bzhir/ / sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te// 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzan mdza' shes 'dra// nga rgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brten bzhin te// thub pa mchin bzhin srid pa'i
132a5(mdo sde): / khri shing gcod // zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing // klu ltar thub pa mi shes rtswa rnams sreg/ thub pa mngara' ltar 'ong bsil gtong mdzad cing // mi yi pad+ma kha 'byed nyim
132a6(mdo sde): bzhin/ / 'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra// thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor// rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba ste// 'gro ba dag la sems mnyam rtsa shing
132a7(mdo sde): bzhin/ / rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing // 'jig rten rjes su mthun 'jug chu dang 'dra// thub pa mtshan mchog mnga' ba thugs rje can// khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung
132b1(mdo sde): yang bstan/ / sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul// byang chub mchog rab tu ni bdag lung ston// drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog/ bdag ni 'gro ba nyon mongs
132b2(mdo sde): 'thab rtsod che/ / sangs rgyas byang chub lung ston ngogs chod la// sems can brgya dag zhi ba de'i lam du khod// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis//
132b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de na 'dug pa de'i mong la// lha dang dri za dang mi dang thams can dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so/
132b4(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin no// mdun na 'don gyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
132b5(mdo sde): 'dzin du stsal te/ de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa dang / gdul
132b6(mdo sde): slab dag yongs su bzung lags so/ / gang dag skar ma stong la sogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te/
132b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyi lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang /
133a1(mdo sde): rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma ngag yongs su spangs pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgying ba rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams
133a2(mdo sde): dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnabs dang / log par lta ba rnams dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdud dang bral ba rnams dang / par mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / mar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang
133a3(mdo sde): dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / bgyi ba ma lags par bgyid pa rnams dang / bsod nams ma lags par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pha rol la
133a4(mdo sde): 'jigs par mi lta ba rnams dang / legs par spyod pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang / de bzhin du lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal dang / 'byor pa dag la brtson pa rnams nyes par
133a5(mdo sde): spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes nyen thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams dang / mkhas pa
133a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang / srid pa'i btson rar chud pa rnams dang / rgyun phyogs su bangs pa rnams dang / 'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'dam du
133a7(mdo sde): bying ba rnams dang / gti mug gi bun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i bgyi ba thams cad ma gtang ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang
133b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags te/ de'i tsher bskal pa/
133b2(mdo sde): bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na/ mi'i tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhra pa 'di dag gis spangs shing bor bas/ de'i tshe sring pa'i dba' glong dang / 'khor ba'i
133b3(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor na skyob par ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang / dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag spangs nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
133b4(mdo sde): zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung shin tu dul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bgyi ba
133b5(mdo sde): bgyis pa'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze de bzhin te/ sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
133b6(mdo sde): du smon lam 'debs par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang yongs su bzung ba rnams ngas kyang de nyid du lung bstan to// bram zes gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
133b7(mdo sde): bdag ni dper na/ shing kang ku shi'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 'dar zhing bdag gi yid ni shin tu stsol/ bdag gi lus thams cad ni shathang bar gyur cing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal
134a1(mdo sde): t e de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phang ste thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i
134a2(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur ba lta na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ba dag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po de la
134a3(mdo sde): skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa na/ sdod cing bdag yun ring po de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar gyur cig/ bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun ring por smin par
134a4(mdo sde): bgyi 'tshal ba'i gdul ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa la spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/ 'dul ba rnams yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las
134a5(mdo sde): dngos pa'i mtshan ma yongs su btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs so zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bgyi ste/ ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan dag na/
134a6(mdo sde): slongs mo pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag 'chi bar 'gyur na yang de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ zas dang skom dang bza' ba dang
134a7(mdo sde): bca' ba dang btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi sbyin pa dang /
134b1(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdar dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / rtadang / shing rta dang / gser dang dngul dang / mgron bu dang nor bu dang / mu tig da
134b2(mdo sde): baiDUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul can dang / sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang du yongs su gtong ba na/ bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid
134b3(mdo sde): kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la stsal nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i don dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams
134b4(mdo sde): yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ gal te yang btang bar dka' ba slong ba'i sems can dag mchis nas/ 'di lta ste/ bran dang bran mo dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / rgyal srid dang
134b5(mdo sde): mchis brang dang / bu dang bu mo dang / lag pa yongs su gtang ba dang / rkang pa yongs su btang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang mig dang / lce dang / pags pa dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang
134b6(mdo sde): lus dang srog dang / mgo yongs su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dag slong bar bgyid na yang mchog tu dga' zhing / snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan
134b7(mdo sde): gdags pa'i slad du/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyad par bgyi ste/ gang sngon chang nam yang sems can gang
135a1(mdo sde): gis kyang de ga bu yongs su gtong ba yongs su btung bar mgyur ba dang / sran ca kyang byang chub sems dpa' than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mang du ltung ba spong pa yang /
135a2(mdo sde): yang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ gang bdag tshe rabs gzhan na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma
135a3(mdo sde): mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
135a4(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa'i g.yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags
135a5(mdo sde): te/ de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag par tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs sna tshogs kyi dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/
135a6(mdo sde): ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang / bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ bdag de lta bu'i bzod pa
135a7(mdo sde): sgom par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar sgom pa la brtson zhing / bla na med pa'i spyod pa las slar
135b1(mdo sde): mi ldog pa gang lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ / 'du byed thams cad la phyin ci log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa gang lags pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/
135b2(mdo sde): phyin pa lags so// rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ gang dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma
135b3(mdo sde): mchis pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis spyod pa la ji ltar sngan chad byang chub sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du/ spyad pa spyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro/
135b4(mdo sde): ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad cing / slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad
135b5(mdo sde): pa spyod par gyur pa dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan pa'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig/ slad ma'i byang chub sems
135b6(mdo sde): dpa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slang ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po
135b7(mdo sde): 'grub par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis par spyod par
136a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / brtson 'grus la brang ba ma mchis pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la/
136a2(mdo sde): gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / shes rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams
136a3(mdo sde): cad du bor ba rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs shing nyam
136a4(mdo sde): nga ba thob pa rnams dang / lnga ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan pa'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par
136a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon gzhag pa'i slad du bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi
136a6(mdo sde): tshor ba la spro bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang / mi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang spro bar
136a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i sa bon 'jog pa lta/ sems can thams cad la yang de bzhin du gyur cig/ chang pa stong pa lta bu dang / sems kyi rgyud
136b1(mdo sde): tshig pa'i 'dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ bdag gis srid pa tham pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa'i skad du skye ba gcig gis thogs shing / dga' ldan gyi
136b2(mdo sde): g nas nas dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs par bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du yang lha'i bde ba skye ba dag don du mi gnyer bar bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
136b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ bdag sangs rgyas re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnams sna tshogs dag bgyid par
136b4(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang
136b5(mdo sde): chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag gi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'dzin
136b6(mdo sde): du stsol bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na yang dag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor bar gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin
136b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams kyang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis dge ba rnams la sbyor bar
137a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can sred med kyi bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa'i bar dag la dad pa rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la
137a2(mdo sde): sbyor bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du nam mkha'i lding rnams la yang nam mkha'i lding gi gzugs dang / brgya byin gyi bar la yang brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis dge ba'i spyod pa dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/
137a3(mdo sde): sems can ltogs pa rnams la yang rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la yang rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig/
137a4(mdo sde): bcud pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po che'i shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis yun
137a5(mdo sde): ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad du/ gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dganod par gyur cig/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung
137a6(mdo sde): gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste/ bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/ gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u skar
137a7(mdo sde): ma skyong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba/ de'i dus na bdag gis 'phags
137b1(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas
137b2(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / 'grogs pa rnams dang / nor bdun dang bral
137b3(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / lam ngan pa'i bar gyis bcom pa rnams dang /
137b4(mdo sde): nyam nga thob pa gang dag dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
137b5(mdo sde): par 'dzin tu stsol ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu stsol la 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge
137b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de yang bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing / ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig/ shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang
137b7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'bul bar yang gyur cig/ de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
138a1(mdo sde): bstan pa yang thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur cig/ sa gnon par yang gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can de dag
138a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin du sgrol cing slob tu sgrol bar yang gyur cig/ de dag kyang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang 'dzin par
138a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la bab ste/ rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de'i tshe/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
138a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das padag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ de'i tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
138a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lags pa'i drung du mchi bar gyur cig/ mchis nas kyang tshogs bgyid par gyur cig/ zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang
138a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyur cig/ chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig
138a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe sems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang / lta ba'i lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid
138b1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyamang ba chen po thob par gyur sems can de dag la yang chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par
138b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshen bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur gyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po
138b3(mdo sde): gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/ dus de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi rtsol
138b4(mdo sde): brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du 'gyur ba na/ bde ba dang / dbang phyug dang rig dang / gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing / ser sna can du gyur te/ snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chung pa'i sems can 'dod
138b5(mdo sde): chags bdo ba/ zhe sdang bdo ba/ gti mug bdo ba/ nga rgyal ba ngo ba/ sdig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna bango ba/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ chos ma
138b6(mdo sde): lags pa'i longs spyod tshol ba/ log par lta ba/ phyin ci log tu mthong ba/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba/ par mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi
138b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyi pa/ bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/ bsod nams bgyi ba'i
139a1(mdo sde): dngos po gsum po dgal mi brtson pa/ theg pa gsum ngon du mi gnyer ba legs par spyod pa gsum la mi brtson pa/ nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa// dge
139a2(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi brtson pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa/ phyin ci log bzhi nyams pa/ rgung pa bzhi la gnas pa/ bdung bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa
139a3(mdo sde): chu bo bzhis ded pa/ sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// dbang po drug gi dregs pas myos pa/ log pa brgyad la zhugs pa/ 'dod
139a4(mdo sde): pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa/ bag la nyal kun nas spong ba/ lha dang mi'i dpal dang / 'byor pa don du mi gnyer ba/ phyin ci log gi lta ba can/ lam ngan pas bcom pa/ mtshams
139a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/ kha ltar mu cor smra ba/ byas pa mi gzo ba/
139a6(mdo sde): dran pa nyams pa/ dge ba la smod pa/ shes rab 'chal ba/ thos pa nyung ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul 'chos pa/ ser sna can/ phan tshun ma snyan pa brjod pa
139a7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig mi gus pa/ le lo can/ dbang po ma tshang ba/ nyam chung ba/ gos ma mchis pa/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa/ bsam pa dang dran pa'i snying po nyam pa
139b1(mdo sde): nang sna tshogs kyis nyen pa/ nyon mongs par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa mi sdug pa/ ngo tshab ma mchis pa/ khrel ma mchis pa/ gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa/ gang dag snga dro gcig la
139b2(mdo sde): lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mang du spyod pa de dag la stong cing / ther zug tu lta ba'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i
139b3(mdo sde): sems dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chums pa'i sems dang / sdang ba'i sems dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang / khon 'dzin pa'i sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems dang /
139b4(mdo sde): rnyog pa'i sems dang / rtsub pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / ma dul ba'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems dang / rgod pa'i sems dang / chos ma lags pa la mngon par
139b5(mdo sde): zhen pa'i sems dang / khyad par la mi gnas pa'i sems dang / phan tshun nongs pa rtsom pa'i sems dang / 'dzings pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang / chos yongs
139b6(mdo sde): su spangs pa'i sems dang / mi brtson pa'i sems dang / chos rnams la nongs par brtson pa'i sems dang / mi dge ba skyed pa'i sems dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mi tshol ba'i sems dang /
139b7(mdo sde): sbyin gnas ma lags pa'i sems dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sems dang / nang dang / rga ba dang / 'chib la yid rton pa'i sems dang /
140a1(mdo sde): kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas pa'i sems dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsrel bar bgyi ba'i sems pa
140a2(mdo sde): kha'i rgyal mtshar bsgreng bar gyi ba'i sems dang / bar tshun mi san pa brjod pa'i sems dang / gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang / phan tshun 'chab la dbang bgyid pa'i sems pa
140a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / 'dod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems dang / thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing
140a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i sems dang / byas pa mi gzo ba'i sems dang / gzhan gyi chung ma brnab pa'i sems dang / gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i sems dang / smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan
140a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dag kyang de'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ / der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sgra dang /
140a6(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dang / nad kyi sgra dang / rga ba'i sgra dang / 'chi ba'i sgra dang / gsod pa'i sgra dang / mi khom pa'i sgra dang / rtag tu dgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang / khung sgo dang /
140a7(mdo sde): khong sgril dang / 'ching ba dang / btson ri'i sgra dang / chang pa'i sgra dang / gnod pa'i sgra dang / mi snyan pa dang / gshe ba dang / spro ba'i sgra dang / khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang /
140b1(mdo sde): tshogs byed pa'i sgra dang / chom rgyun gyi sgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang / mu ge'i sgra dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i sgra dang / brdzun du smra ba'i sgra dang / ltas ngan n+ya
140b2(mdo sde): sgra dang / bla ma'i sgra dang / tshig rtsub pa'i sgra dang / tshig khyal pa'i sgra dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sgra dang / kun tu 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang /
140b3(mdo sde): bdag gir 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sgra dang / 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang / nyo tshong gi sgra dang / gcig gi gcig 'khol zhing 'tshe ba'i
140b4(mdo sde): sgra dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang / dring ba'i sgra dang / grang ba'i sgra dang / tsha ba'i sgra dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sgra dang / ngal ba dang chad par tshol ba'i sgra dang / zhing slas kyi
140b5(mdo sde): sgra dang / bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag ste/ sems can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so//
140b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag thos nas kun tu btam
140b7(mdo sde): par gyur te/ sems can de dag ni thams cad de dag ni mkhyen pa dag gis stongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bza' ba dang btung ba dang / dul ba dang // yang dag
141a1(mdo sde): bar sdom pa dang / dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'grogs la/ mun khrong nas mun khrong du mchi ba'i sems
141a2(mdo sde): can de dag ni/ de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgyad nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so// sems can de dag gi las kyi rkyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
141a3(mdo sde): mjed kyang / / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te/ sa gzhi pa tsa can du 'gyur sa gzhi gor ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdul dang
141a4(mdo sde): ri rang rong can du 'gyur/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / bya gdug pa dag gis kun tu bltam pa 'gyur/ dus ma lags par rdul gyis
141a5(mdo sde): 'khrigs pa'i bser ma ldang bar 'gyur/ dus ma lags par ro ma mchis pa dang / lan tshwa dang 'dres pa dang / mi bsil ba'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur zhing / de ltar sa la lo tog dang / sman dang
141a6(mdo sde): rtswa dang shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / nor rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / nyer bar
141a7(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang / rnyog pa can dang / rung rong po dang / rtsub pa dang / dug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang / slar zhing rgya cher rtsub pa dang
141b1(mdo sde): gdug pa dang / khro ba dang / gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / 'jungs pa dang / gshe ba dang / gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems
141b2(mdo sde): dang / gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang / khrag 'tshal ba dang / ri dgas kyi pags pa 'tshal ba dang / mtshon thogs pa dang / srog chags 'gums pa la brtson

148a6(mdo sde): bdag de'i tshe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi gling bzhi pa ji snyed mchis par gyur pa'i gling bzhi pa thams cad du yongs su dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'bab cing ma'i mngal du skye ba ston par gyur cig
148a7(mdo sde): rgya cher 'gyu na gzhon nu rtse ba dang / bzo dang / las kyi gnas dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
148b1(mdo sde): ba dang / gling bzhi pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag nye bar ston par gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sku gdung 'god pa'i bar dag nye bar ston par yang gyur cig//
148b2(mdo sde): bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig brjod pas chos ston par 'gyur zhing nya thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi sde snod kyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rang sangs rgyas
148b3(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sems can gang lags pa de dag
148b4(mdo sde): gis ni/ theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag la ni/ sbyin pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/
148b5(mdo sde): bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ris kyi bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni/ tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang /
148b6(mdo sde): rnyog pa'i sems dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ srog gcod pa rnams kyis ni/ snying rje bstan par 'tshal bar gyur
148b7(mdo sde): cig/ phrag dog dang ser snas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ gzugs dang gzugam mchis pa'i dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
149a1(mdo sde): kyis ni/ btang snyoms brjod pa'i gtam gyis chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi dregs pas myos pas sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni//
149a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa ma lags pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po pa'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pas sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs
149a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / rngub pa dran pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa'i chos bsten par 'tshal bar gyur cig
149a4(mdo sde): thos pa nyung ba rnams kyis ni bsgyud pa ma mchis shing / thos pa 'dzin pa chung mi za ba brjod pas chos bstan par gyur cig/ lta ba ngan pa nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod
149a5(mdo sde): pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni// mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ smon pa ma
149a6(mdo sde): mchis pa'i yongs su dag pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyis ni bsam pa yongs su
149a7(mdo sde): dag pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'dres par spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mjed pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar
149b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ zad pa'i sbyor ba drod nyams pa rnams kyis ni bcos ma ma lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa nyams pa rnams
149b2(mdo sde): kyis ni rten pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang / dge ba
149b3(mdo sde): mi bskyud pa rnams kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang / bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni/ stong pa nyid brjod pa dang / don dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni
149b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa brjod pa dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis ni bral ba brjod pa dang / lam ni mnyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/
149b5(mdo sde): rnam par ldog par brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtog pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang / 'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni mngon par dga'
149b6(mdo sde): ba brjod pa dang / dge ba dang sa dang / ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ni rmongs pa brjod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa
149b7(mdo sde): dang / gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni 'od zer thogs pa med pa brjod pa dang / las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang /
150a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa rnams kyis ni/ seng ge'i tog brjod pa dang / bdung bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa pa/
150a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ri ba'i phung po brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
150a3(mdo sde): snang bas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang / shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / gti mug gi mun par
150a4(mdo sde): mchis pa rnams kyis ni/ nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang / zad pa'i dri 'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang / bdag la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur mngon par 'tshal
150a5(mdo sde): bab rnams kyis ni sred med kyi bu brjod pa dang / blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / spyi gtsug ltar bda' ba rnams kyis ni/ lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang
150a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni/ snying po can brjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams
150a7(mdo sde): kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang / chos thams cad la smon pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni spyod pa dang ldan pa
150b1(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni/ shes rab sgron ma brjod pa dang / phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa
150b2(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni/ mig mi 'dzums pa brjod pa dang
150b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni// 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / rgyu ma mchis
150b4(mdo sde): pa'i rigs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rigs pa la brtan pa'i rjes su mthun pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu ther zug lta ba rnams kyis ni/ legs par
150b5(mdo sde): bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thogs pa rnams kyis ni/ so so
150b6(mdo sde): sgrub pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la
150b7(mdo sde): yang dang yang du 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang / shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams
151a1(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyas
151a2(mdo sde): ni/ ci yang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams
151a3(mdo sde): kyis ni shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshol ba rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam
151a4(mdo sde): par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / shes pa ma bsgom shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtsha
151a5(mdo sde): du sems pa rnams kyis ni/ semA ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / phan tshun legs
151a6(mdo sde): par smra ba la mi dga' ba rnams kyis ni rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis ni bsod nams che ba brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo'i cher rab tu 'bab pas
151a7(mdo sde): chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi sprin brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen bkod pa brjod pa dang / shes pa nyams pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa
151b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni dpe ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba can thams cad kyis ni nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa dang / chos thams cad gzhan ma lags par sems pa rnams kyis ni
151b2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongasu ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par
151b3(mdo sde): bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni/ rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / mdo sde
151b4(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam par nges pa rnams kyis ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod pa dang / snying por 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa rnams kyis ni/ chos
151b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba'i rjes
151b6(mdo sde): su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ gzhan gyi dri nga mi
151b7(mdo sde): 'jog pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mngon par mi brtson pa rnams kyis ni ye shes thob pa brjod pa dang / nye du la yang dag par ston pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba
152a1(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams//
152a2(mdo sde): kyis ni/ mi choms pa brjod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi zad pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang /
152a3(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang / blta ba don mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyun 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni
152a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
152a5(mdo sde): kyi dgos pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ mtha' ma mchis pa dang / thug pa ma mchis pa brjod pas/ chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa/ sgyu
152a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa/ drang ba drang ba'i rang bzhin can te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi
152a7(mdo sde): sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
152b1(mdo sde): rnams go cha chen po 'tshal bar gyur cig/ smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyi mi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur cig/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / byang chub kyi yan
152b2(mdo sde): tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ ngag legs par spras pas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
152b3(mdo sde): du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du/ thos pas brgyan pa dang / gzungs bskyud pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dran pas brgyan
152b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du yid kyis brgyan cing / mya ngan las 'das pa brgyan pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pas slad du/ bsam pas brgyan pa dang / dam bcas
152b5(mdo sde): pa nyams su lon pa'i slad du/ sbyor bar brgyan pa dang / sa nas sar phar pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyan pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du/ sbyin pas brgyan pa
152b6(mdo sde): dang legs par thos pa khong du dri ma ma mchis pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhes 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bzod pas
152b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / tshogs thams cad nye bar bsags pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du
153a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su 'tshal ba'i skad du/ shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang ngas
153a2(mdo sde): par skyob pa'i rjes su mchis pa'i slad du/ byams pas brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du/ snying rjes brgyan pa dang / chos thams cad la
153a3(mdo sde): the tsom mchis par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ dga' bas brgyan pa dang / mthon dman gnyis pa dang bral ba'i slad du/ btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad
153a4(mdo sde): kyis rnam par brtse ba'i slad du/ mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang / longs spyod mi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i slad du/ bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can
153a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du/ ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa dang / shes rab
153a6(mdo sde): kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du/ snang bas brgyan par gyur cig/ don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig
153a7(mdo sde): pas brgyan par gyur cig/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi nor pa'i slad du/ mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rjes su thob pa'i
153b1(mdo sde): slad du/ yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston cing / chos kyi brgyan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas//
153b2(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du/ snang bas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du/ 'od kyis brgyan pa dang / khyad par lung stong pa'i slad du
153b3(mdo sde): kun rjod pa'i chos 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su ston pa gsol ba'i slad du/ rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi'i dam
153b4(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
153b5(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes thos pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing / thams cad kyis mi chom pa'i slad du/ dge
153b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag la yang dag gis tshig gcig brjod
153b7(mdo sde): pas dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang dag par bsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur cig/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
154a1(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
154a2(mdo sde): bar yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag mtshams
154a3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/
154a4(mdo sde): sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/ rtsub pa/ sdig pa 'tshal ba/ kho khro dang dmu rgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la yang bdag gis sems dang skad brgyad khri
154a5(mdo sde): bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig/ sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen
154a6(mdo sde): bo par gyur pa de dag la yang / bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
154a7(mdo sde): durgya cher ston par gyur cig/ yang de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar
154b1(mdo sde): ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gi gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la 'god par gyur zhing skad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'che ba la dga' ba rnams ni/ srog gcod pa spong ba la
154b2(mdo sde): 'god par gyur cig/ 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni/ ma byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod pas chags pa rnams ni/ 'dod pa la log par
154b3(mdo sde): g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ phan tshun brdzun gyi tshig smra ba rnams ni/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni/ chang dang bcos pa'i
154b4(mdo sde): chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag nongs pa lnga po pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni nongs pa lnga po spong zhing / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god par
154b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnam la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni/ bdag gis nyin zhag gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/
