161a2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
161a3(mdo sde): dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'chal bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzang ba/
161a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sems can gang dag mtshams ma
161a5(mdo sde): mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las dag yang dag par sog par 'gyur ba rnams dang // sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
161a6(mdo sde): kyi bar dag 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba 'am/ kun nas slong bar 'gyur
161a7(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad kyi don tu bdag las nges sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi sems can dag ni sam+ba sa dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig
161b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par gyur pa'i yun ring po de srid kyis
161b2(mdo sde): bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na/ sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas
161b3(mdo sde): bslang ba dang / 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas/ sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / ngu 'bong chen po dang / ngu 'bod dang / bsdus gzhom dang
161b4(mdo sde): thig nag dang / yang sos kyi bar dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yang brjod par
161b5(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du hrul bum dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig
161b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyeng po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on
161b7(mdo sde): pa dang / long ba dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mi gtsang ba za
162a1(mdo sde): ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
162a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu'i yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams dang skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring
162a3(mdo sde): bo de srid du/ bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam
162a4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig/ ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag lta bu yongs su rdzogs
162a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba lta na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis dbang du gyur cig/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas
162a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing / ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
162a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gi ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thog cing bdag bskal pa bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga
162b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan tu
162b2(mdo sde): gsol de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rjen sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la
162b3(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can zab mo rnams la snying
162b4(mdo sde): rje chen po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so legs so// lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing / mtshams med
162b5(mdo sde): pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
162b6(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam nges na/ sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur bar shes so// sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar par bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de
162b7(mdo sde): bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'amed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur cig/ rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid
163a1(mdo sde): kyang ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/ e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po// khyod ni bdel mi gnas te// khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan/
163a2(mdo sde): khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin// de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags// dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul//
163a3(mdo sde): dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de// gzungs dang ye shes kyis ni mdzad du 'gyur// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams//
163a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i don du kun nas 'dus pa dag/ mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi// khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// brtson
163a5(mdo sde): 'grus ting 'dzor brtan pa dang / / mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog/ phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis// de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras
163a6(mdo sde): pa/ snying rje chen pos sems can la// de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin// khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang // mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
163a7(mdo sde): rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis sems can 'jig mang lam/
163b1(mdo sde): byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par// sems can la brtse gzhan med de// gang
163b2(mdo sde): phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog/ khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan// spos kyis seng shes smras pa// khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni// bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe// sems can
163b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing / / khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// skye ba'i dgon par brtson myur cing // log rgyus shin tu
163b4(mdo sde): nyam nga ba/ / sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// mi 'khrugs pas smras pa// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chung cing // nyon mongs 'dam du byung gyur la//
163b5(mdo sde): mtshams med pa dag byed pa po// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// spos kyi glang pos smras pa// khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba// ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin//
163b6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// rin po che tog gis smras pa// ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags la
163b7(mdo sde): skur pa 'debs byed pa/ / sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// 'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa// khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du// sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba/
164a1(mdo sde): chang pa stong 'drar gnas gyur pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// lag na ut+pa las smras pa// khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'a
164a2(mdo sde): ba bcom/ / skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// ye shes grags pas smras pa// nang mang dag gis nyen pa dang // nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag/ ye she
164a3(mdo sde): chu yis ni byas te/ / bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom// gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa// ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin// nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste// nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i//
164a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la med// ut+pa la zla bas kyang smras pa// ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas// brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos// srid pa'i bcing bas rab bsdams pa// khams
164a5(mdo sde): gsum po dag grol bar byed/ / dri med dbang pos smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi// snying rje chen po dag bstan pa// snying rje'i rgyud las byung ba po// khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo//
164a6(mdo sde): stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa// nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tshe// byang chub gang dag khyod la rten// khyod kyis nyon mongs rtsad nas bcang // smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur//
164a7(mdo sde): skar ma skyong gis smras pa// ye shes mdzod pang mtshungs 'dra ba// dri meng smon lam btab pa yis// byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi// sma na dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
164b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams// nyon mongs nang
164b2(mdo sde): rnams rnam par bcom/ / khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can// sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri za dang / mi dang
164b3(mdo sde): bcas pa dag gis kyang / bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ don dang tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do//
164b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod la sa chen
164b5(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur cing / phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs
164b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / kun tu rab tu 'u ra'ur gyi bar du gyur nas/ yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
164b7(mdo sde): sing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang
165a1(mdo sde): ston pa dag tu yang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur cing / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / 'od mtha'
165a2(mdo sde): yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na
165a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan
165a4(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus so// yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs
165a5(mdo sde): logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin
165a6(mdo sde): po che bsags pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/
165a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos bston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
165b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// de bzhin
165b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang
165b3(mdo sde): lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa
165b4(mdo sde): de na'ajig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
165b5(mdo sde): babar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
165b6(mdo sde): 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
165b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
166a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu sa son/ smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang
166a2(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su 'dul ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod
166a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan ming nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang mtshams med pa byed cing / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rlung
166a4(mdo sde): tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang
166a5(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson
166a6(mdo sde): zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug nas/ de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
166a7(mdo sde): snying po'i spyan sngar na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ / gang gi tshe sems can chen po des/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lda nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/
166b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nges 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul skye dag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i/
166b2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
166b3(mdo sde): smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyeng ngag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /
166b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'i bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i tshe 'phrul dag
166b5(mdo sde): bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang
166b6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur
166b7(mdo sde): cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring po ji srid cig nas
167a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed cing / yun ring po rnga srod cig tu byang chub kyi sgrud pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thabs ba/ 'a stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen
167a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa des ni da gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
167a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa
167a4(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshogs dris la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba skyes
167a5(mdo sde): bu dam pa khyed la dri bar mdzad do/ / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying rje
167a6(mdo sde): chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sgras gang bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying
167a7(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no/ / skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po
167b1(mdo sde): brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
167b2(mdo sde): rdul snyed na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// gang khyod
167b3(mdo sde): kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan
167b4(mdo sde): 'das la phul ba rnams kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par 'gyur te/ de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
167b5(mdo sde): pab dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyir lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang / phyis
167b6(mdo sde): b skal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag sangs rgyas nyid
167b7(mdo sde): thob cing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smos shig
168a1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegasapa
168a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang lnga yan lag gsum gyis legs
168a3(mdo sde): so zhes bgyi ba springs shing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di skur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
168a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la na bab par shes na deng la// der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jig
168a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che tog dang / zla ba tog gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blang ste/ byang chub sems
168a6(mdo sde): dpa'i dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bsags pa nas 'a phags na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ klog bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang
168a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
168b1(mdo sde): che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phral pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis
168b2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na/ bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong
168b3(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas/ gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag skur pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin/
168b4(mdo sde): pa lta snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa
168b5(mdo sde): rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/
168b6(mdo sde): shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
168b7(mdo sde): yang dag rtog tu lhag pa dang / bram ze la me tog dag skur pa dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su
169a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa gam bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
169a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis bsgyings pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
169a3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to/ / 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a4(mdo sde): chen po gnyis la/ / gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ gcig shos ni seng ge rdo rje tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
169a5(mdo sde): seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen
169a6(mdo sde): ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas/ byang chub
169a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lpags pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang
169b1(mdo sde): tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can
169b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i sman zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// de na
169b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes
169b4(mdo sde): bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces/ don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du
169b5(mdo sde): yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ / yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi
169b6(mdo sde): khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
169b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes
170a1(mdo sde): bya gcig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me
170a2(mdo sde): tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a3(mdo sde): 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jig
170a4(mdo sde): pa bral ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la/ gcig ni rnam par
170a5(mdo sde): snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ gcig shos ni rnam par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a6(mdo sde): nyis 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas
170a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos bston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
170b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la ni gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par
170b2(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher
170b3(mdo sde): g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/
170b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin
170b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul
170b6(mdo sde): bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
170b7(mdo sde): to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang
171a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
171a2(mdo sde): mang po dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang
171a3(mdo sde): brjod pas na/ gang+gA'i thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams
171a4(mdo sde): m ed pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad snying
171a5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la
171a6(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed do//
171a7(mdo sde): sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga
171b1(mdo sde): na pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po dag
171b2(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'gul ba dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang /
171b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
171b5(mdo sde): chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to// //
171b6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las bam po bcu gnyis pa// / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis
171b7(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa
172a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa/
172a2(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
172a3(mdo sde): po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegags pa rnam par
172a4(mdo sde): snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag
172a5(mdo sde): khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
172a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
172a7(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyed la dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma
172b1(mdo sde): med pa 'di dag kyang skur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba yang byin to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sad
172b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing / snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ni khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
172b3(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs
172b4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
172b5(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
172b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag
172b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su
173a1(mdo sde): bzung ba dag dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur to/ / nas kyad kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang /
173a2(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
173a3(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/
173a4(mdo sde): rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smros shig/ yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag
173a5(mdo sde): gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag
173a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang de ya yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i
173a7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
173b1(mdo sde): ngag de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/
173b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas/ yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de
173b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sna mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs
173b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i tshal gyis bskyes mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
173b5(mdo sde): che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo / / yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang
173b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang / lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ til gyi
173b7(mdo sde): zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang / theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag
174a1(mdo sde): gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ting nge 'dzin
174a2(mdo sde): gyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na/ bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i
174a3(mdo sde): 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa rjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la/ me
174a4(mdo sde): tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa'i 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom
174a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis
174a6(mdo sde): khyed la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur zhing skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar snga
174a7(mdo sde): smos pa bzhin no/ / me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu bab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar/
174b1(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon
174b2(mdo sde): par shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams
174b3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi sgra ste/ me tog gi char chen po de dag gis
174b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i sgra de lta bus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phral che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag 'dul
174b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam gyi
174b6(mdo sde): dbang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba las bskum pa 'am bskum pa las
174b7(mdo sde): brkyang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
175a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la/ mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/
175a2(mdo sde): de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
175a3(mdo sde): po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol/
175a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag
175a5(mdo sde): rtog rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/ ri dang shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtswa dang shing dang sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo // sems
175a6(mdo sde): can gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/ kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig ni btsod ka/ kha cig ni
175a7(mdo sde): dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni me lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lta bur/ kha cig ni smig sgyu lta bur/ kha cig ni ri mo
175b1(mdo sde): lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/ kha cig ni me tog lta bur/ kha cig ni mkha' lding lta bur/ kha cig ni seng ge lta bur/ kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ kha cig/

175b5(mdo sde): ngongo/ / rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dag dang / nam mkha' la 'dug pa'am/ 'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong ste/ bdag
175b6(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa

176a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan par byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so legs so// bram ze 'di lta ste/ dper/

176a3(mdo sde): gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod de/ de la me tog kha cig kha dog dang / dris ni dpag tshad brgyar kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/ kha cig gis ni dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang de lhan ner byed
176a4(mdo sde): cing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na me tog kha cig rlog dang / dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed la/ de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis// me tog
176a5(mdo sde): de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/ 'on pa rnams kyis ni na ba dag thob par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad thob par 'gyur

176a7(mdo sde): dag myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / sems rmugs pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis/ me tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa

176b5(mdo sde): nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur ba dang /

179b7(mdo sde): gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
180a1(mdo sde): chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/ / sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan snga na
180a2(mdo sde): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs mo lnga dang ldan
180a3(mdo sde): par dag yongs su bzung ngo / / de nas sems can chen po des nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas par byas nas/
180a4(mdo sde): derer ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
180a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang nga la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de na
180a6(mdo sde): gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des/ snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs
180a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag/
180b1(mdo sde): smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
180b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so legs so zhes pho nya btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so// nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan pa mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
180b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam du mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin
180b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis/ skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na med pa yang dag
180b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag
180b6(mdo sde): gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo / / des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de/
180b7(mdo sde): rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji
181a1(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na/ sems can tshe ring ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin
181a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par
181a3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung dus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis kyang de ltar
181a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing / smon lam khyad par can
181a5(mdo sde): btab pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil kyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan
181a6(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su
181a7(mdo sde): bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i
181b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no/ / bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa dang
181b2(mdo sde): sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas
181b3(mdo sde): tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya ba'i pad+ma dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la/ sems
181b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ bram ze 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gis phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung
181b5(mdo sde): zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i
181b6(mdo sde): dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /
181b7(mdo sde): byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi zung ba zhig bar mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
182a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' cheg po rnams kyi bcon 'grus brtsams pa'i dadam pa yin te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bad+ma dkar po rnams zhes bya'i matog la burnams zhes ma
182a2(mdo sde): bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na/ khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag
182a3(mdo sde): tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du/ dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
182a4(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
182a5(mdo sde): rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas/ khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so// 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod
182a6(mdo sde): pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye
182a7(mdo sde): ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing // rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa 'dren pa med
182b1(mdo sde): pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa/ nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba
182b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba nas/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni
182b3(mdo sde): bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang bskur ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi
182b4(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu
182b5(mdo sde): mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha'
182b6(mdo sde): dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
182b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i
183a1(mdo sde): chos la stong lhag par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang / lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sa sa
183a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du/ yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na gnas 'gro zhes bya ba na/ bram ze zhig
183a3(mdo sde): yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba
183a4(mdo sde): dang / 'grogs par byed par gyur nas/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur no// bdag khyod kyi phar gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag
183a5(mdo sde): gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing / khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/
183a6(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas/ bdag bla na med
183a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lci spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa pham pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod bsgyur
183b1(mdo sde): pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyur cig/ khyod kyi byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang brgya byin pa
183b2(mdo sde): rol sems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ / kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
183b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nyan thos zung du gyur cig/ gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod lha mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas
183b4(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig/ gzhan yang ri'o rtse'i lha mo nges pa king sha ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor
183b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po
183b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/ khyod la
183b7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
184a1(mdo sde): bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig/ chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig/
184a2(mdo sde): 'chi ba med pa yang rtogs par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na lha dang klu dang / lha ma yin gang+gA
184a3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis kyang / / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar bkod do// de nas 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur
184a4(mdo sde): 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig/ bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod
184a5(mdo sde): la 'bras bu dang bcas pa spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig/ rtag tu dngos po bsdang ba'i don du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig/ mal cha dang / stan dang / bgo ba dang / glang po che dang
184a6(mdo sde): tadang shing rta dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong bdal dang / khyim dang bu dang / bu mo dang / sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang / rus pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lce dang / rna ba dang sna
184a7(mdo sde): dang mig dang / mgo dag slong bar gyur cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su yang gyur
184b1(mdo sde): cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyim byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig/ nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyis nyan thos kyi gnas thob par/
184b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig/ rjes su chos ston par gyur cig/ khyed kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu bram
184b3(mdo sde): ze snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed bos te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
184b4(mdo sde): nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba ni legs so legs so/ / khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ ngas kyang sems rab tu dang
184b5(mdo sde): bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la yang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa na
184b6(mdo sde): po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
184b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi mdun slongs mo pa gang dag mchis nas/ zas slong bar bgyid cing / tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsub po 'am/ brnyas pa'i tshig gam/ tshig gsal
185a1(mdo sde): bas slongs par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyis skad cig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/
185a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas/ sbyin pa stsol bar gyur na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
185a3(mdo sde): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa
185a4(mdo sde): bcon ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems ma dang bas sbyin pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de yang len pa po la dad pas/ byin par gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas
185a5(mdo sde): tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i chos
185a6(mdo sde): narnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/ bdag kyang mnar med par 'chi bar gyur cig/ zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slongs mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang / mgo'i bar dge slong bar 'gyur zhing / tshig 'jam
185a7(mdo sde): po 'am/ tshig nub po 'am/ brnyas tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar dge slong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis spongs mo pa la sems kyis skad cig gcig tsam zhig
185b1(mdo sde): khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
185b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur pa nas/ bdag mnar med par 'chi ba'i bar du gyur cig/ sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims nas/ shes rab dag yongs su gtong ba la yang brjod par
185b3(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu
